channel.title: The radialwalking tut script
channel.description:
hey i was looking around the other day an i found this awsome script on radialwalking i think freddy or kane made it anyway i cant remeber were i found it an i been looking for ages i was wondering if anyone could link me to it i would be very happy if you could its probly in a real easy to find place lol.
for those who dont know what script i mean its a script that shows you the cords an radius of radialmap walking it is very handy to use an i need it as i doing alot of walking in a script i am making.
if anyone knows the location of this script i would be very greatful if you linked it to me.
thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 04:42:55 AM[/size][hr]anyone know?

item.title: The radialwalking tut script
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

it was not kane nor freddy

[size=10pt]It was ME[/size] ;D ;D ;D

its in SCAR 2.03\Includes\SRL\Scripts\Radial Walking Aid.scar

im glad you like it so much

Read full topic
